main.name: Plugins
main.description: All the Plugin managing functions, not provided by a plugin, but included in the core.

children.name: add
children.description: Add a plugin to the Game.

children.name: use
children.description: Use this plugin for its type, e.g. if the name matches a Camera plugin, that plugin will be used as the camera for the Game.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the plugin to use.
